meanings.definition: The rigid outer part of the earth, consisting of the crust and upper mantle.
meanings.sent1: The lithospheres protect the earth's surface.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the lithospheres to understand earthquakes.
meanings.sent3: The lithospheres decided to have a rock party.
meanings.sent4: Her strength was like the lithospheres, unyielding and firm.
meanings.sent5: The lithospheres, like a shield, shielded the planet from harm.

meanings.definition: The solid, outermost shell of a rocky planet.
meanings.sent1: Explorers discovered new lithospheres on the alien planet.
meanings.sent2: The lithospheres of Mars differ from those of Earth.
meanings.sent3: The lithospheres threw a surprise birthday party for the core.
meanings.sent4: The lithospheres of the moon glowed in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The lithospheres held the secrets of the planet within their rocky embrace.
